## HytopiaUI.onData() method

Registers a listener for data events triggered by `emitData()`<!-- -->. Use for local UI state management.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onData(callback: (data: object) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

callback


</td><td>

(data: object) =&gt; void


</td><td>

Function to call when data is emitted


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
